solution_line_template: {total_senior_students} x {full_merit_percentage} = <<{total_senior_students}*{full_merit_percentage}={full_merit_scholarship_students}>>{full_merit_scholarship_students} senior students got a full merit scholarship.

{total_senior_students} x {half_merit_percentage} = <<{total_senior_students}*{half_merit_percentage}={half_merit_scholarship_students}>>{half_merit_scholarship_students} senior students got a half merit scholarship.

So, a total of {full_merit_scholarship_students} + {half_merit_scholarship_students} = <<{full_merit_scholarship_students}+{half_merit_scholarship_students}={total_scholarship_students}>>{total_scholarship_students} students got scholarships.

Therefore, {total_senior_students} - {total_scholarship_students} = <<{total_senior_students}-{total_scholarship_students}={no_scholarship_students}>>{no_scholarship_students} senior students did not get any scholarships.
